Name: BattleParty
About the game: BattleParty is a 2D survival co-op game in an apocalyptic world. Your only goal, to survive as long as possible! Grrrr! Do you hear them too? The zombies ! Your only worst enemies, if they catch you, they will devour you! Do not allow yourself to be fooled, look for what to defend yourself: weapon, grenade, rocket launcher or even your grandma if necessary! If you have nothing on hand, run as fast as you can! You've guessed, we will gave you weapons, there is something for everyone! It's not enough? Okay, very good, well you also have vehicles, hell yeaah!! With that, you can move faster, and even crush a few zombies, but be very careful with your fuel gauge!
